description: Regional groupings for Doc C/D document generation (8 regions)

pnw.name: Pacific Northwest / Columbia River Basin
pnw.core_frame: Drought, fisheries, snowpack, wildfire, treaty salmon, flood
pnw.treaty_trust_angle: Treaty fisheries, ceded lands, salmon recovery

alaska.name: Alaska
alaska.core_frame: Permafrost, coastal erosion, displacement/relocation, infrastructure failure

plains.name: Great Plains / Northern Plains
plains.core_frame: Drought, water scarcity, extreme heat, wind energy, rangeland
plains.treaty_trust_angle: Water rights, treaty obligations, reserved rights

southwest.name: Southwest / Great Basin
southwest.core_frame: Drought, wildfire, extreme heat, water rights, solar energy
southwest.treaty_trust_angle: Senior water rights, Colorado River, Winters doctrine

greatlakes.name: Great Lakes / Midwest
greatlakes.core_frame: Flooding, invasive species, PFAS, algal blooms, treaty resources
greatlakes.treaty_trust_angle: Treaty resources (wild rice, fisheries), ceded territories

southeast.name: Southeast / Gulf Coast / Five Tribes
southeast.core_frame: Hurricanes, sea level rise, displacement, coastal resilience
southeast.treaty_trust_angle: Coastal displacement, trust responsibility, removal history

northeast.name: Northeast / Mid-Atlantic / South and Eastern Tribes
northeast.core_frame: Coastal flooding, sea level rise, precipitation, recognition intersection

crosscutting.name: Cross-Cutting (All Regions)
crosscutting.core_frame: Science infrastructure, NCAR, NSF, 638/CSC, structural policy
